RWmisc 0.0.3

Project to UTM

Source: R/projectUTM.R
projectUTM.Rd

Project an object in latitude/longitude to UTM.

projectUTM(sfo)

Arguments

sfo

A simplefeature object in latitude-longitude CRS.

Value

A simplefeature object projected to UTM CRS.

Examples

library(sf)
nc <- st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package="sf"))
#> Reading layer `nc' from data source `/home/travis/R/Library/sf/shape/nc.shp' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
#> Simple feature collection with 100 features and 14 fields
#> geometry type:  MULTIPOLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -84.32385 ymin: 33.88199 xmax: -75.45698 ymax: 36.58965
#> CRS:            4267
st_crs(projectUTM(nc))
#> Coordinate Reference System:
#>   User input: +proj=utm +zone=17 
#>   wkt:
#> PROJCS["UTM Zone 17, Northern Hemisphere",
#>     GEOGCS["WGS 84",
#>         DATUM["unknown",
#>             SPHEROID["WGS84",6378137,298.257223563]],
#>         PRIMEM["Greenwich",0],
#>         UNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],
#>     PROJECTION["Transverse_Mercator"],
#>     PARAMETER["latitude_of_origin",0],
#>     PARAMETER["central_meridian",-81],
#>     PARAMETER["scale_factor",0.9996],
#>     PARAMETER["false_easting",500000],
#>     PARAMETER["false_northing",0],
#>     UNIT["Meter",1]]
